name: Roly-Moley - itemLabel Summer Games Entry
description:
It's a hot summer day and Moley just can't wait to be buried! Help MunMun roll the Moleys down to the shovel at the end of the beach so they can get back underground! The closer you roll them, the more points you get! Oh, but watch out for those Bigpys...

This is my entry for the itemLabel Summer Games contest (check it out here: https://twitter.com/itemLabel/status/1545102249138995205?s=20&t=T-zsYdI25m01-SCB...)
